name: Froggu
description:
Froggu

The Game

Froggu is a single-player platformer in which the player's controls are continuously stolen by a thieving mischievous rat. 

Traverse levels quickly using your remaining controls and abilities to track down this rat and attempt to regain your control.

Team

Daniel Conway - Programming

Nicole Adams - Art and Animation

Nathaniel Lantz - Design

Ridley McCart - Environment Art
